attributes.action: Stop loud pop pop exhausts and stop ultra bright head lights.
attributes.additional_details: Waking up people in neighbourhoods at all hours, scaring animals and the elderly, making them jump, and could cause a heart attack. The headlights are blinding for oncoming drivers which can cause accidents.
attributes.background: Create regulation to control exhaust noise levels and brightness of headlights.

rejection.details:
There is already regulation in place regarding vehicle noise limits:
https://www.gov.uk/noise-pollution-road-train-plane

If you'd like these to change, you could start a petition setting out clearly what changes you'd like.

Regarding car headlights, there’s already a petition about this issue. We cannot accept a new petition when we already have one about a very similar issue.

You are more likely to get action on an issue if you sign and share a single petition.

You may wish to sign this petition:

Regulate the brightness and type of vehicle headlights allowed: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711112
